desc: Lemon Leaf makes handcrafted meals such as lasagnes, pies and rolls, in addition to fresh protein balls. Our products are 100% gluten-free and lactose-free, with some vegan friendly options and Low FODMAP certified meals.

layout.text: 100% Gluten Free & Lactose Free with Low FODMAP & Vegan Friendly Options
Nutritious and delicious, handcrafted with great quality, fresh and locally sourced ingredients.
